column3: chapter in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''

column1: The '''Cottage of Lost Play''' (also known as "Mar Vanwa Tyaliéva"), formerly known as the '''Cottage of the Children''' and '''Cottage of the Play of Sleep''', was a house upon [[Tol Eressëa]] where [[Lindo]] dwelt, and where [[Eriol]] (Ælfwine) learnt stories of old.<ref>{{HM
